## Component.removeChild() method

Removes a child component, unloading it

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeChild<T extends Component>(component: T): T;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter              | Type           | Description |
| ---------------------- | -------------- | ----------- |
| <code>component</code> | <code>T</code> |             |

**Returns:**

`T`
